title: Looking for a long term python developer
snippet:
Hello, We are looking for a long term python developer. We have multiple projects on Web Scraping related jobs and we are looking for additional programmers. We will follow a two stage interview process where a small programming problem will be given in the first stage and an interview will be conducted on Skype or Telephone in the second stage. 

Upon selection of appropriate candidates, we will be paying on an hourly basis.
